entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student at Hogwarts who receives a Howler from his grandmother.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig is Harry's owl that nips him on the wrist to get his attention.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who receives a letter from an unknown sender.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts who receives a letter from an unknown sender.

entities.name: slytherin table
entities.description: The Slytherin table is a group of students that laugh at Neville's misfortune.

relationships.description: Neville was laughed at by the Slytherin table.
Hedwig nipped Harry on the wrist to get his attention.
Neville received a Howler from his grandmother.
